hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_PUSH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Flag to indicate that successful builds should be pushed to the selected docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the Docker Registry Account

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Email Address for the Docker Registry Account

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +e #Default compose args COMPOSE_ARGS=" -f jenkins.yml -p jenkins " TAG=$(git describe --tags --exact-match) if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then HAS_TAG=true else HAS_TAG=false fi HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BRANCH_NAME=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}
#Make sure old containers are gone sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS stop sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS rm --force -v
#build the system # TODO: evaluate if builds should use --no-cache if [ $HAS_TAG -eq 0 ]; then BUILD_ARGS=" --no-cache " fi
sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS build $BUILD_ARGS return $?

set +e #Default compose args COMPOSE_ARGS=" -f jenkins.yml -p jenkins " TAG=$(git describe --tags --exact-match) if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then HAS_TAG=true else HAS_TAG=false fi HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BRANCH_NAME=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}
#Run unit tests RANDID=$(date | md5sum | head -c 6) CONTAINER_ID=jenkins_visualiser_$RANDID sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS run --no-deps -e ENV=UNIT --name=$CONTAINER_ID visualiser ERR=$? sudo docker cp $CONTAINER_ID:/tmp/nosetests.xml ./nosetests.xml
sudo docker rm --force $CONTAINER_ID
sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS up -d --no-build CONTAINER_ID=$(sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS ps -q)
#Run system test if unit tests passed if [ $ERR -eq 0 ]; then IP=$(sudo docker inspect -f {{.NetworkSettings.IPAddress}} $CONTAINER_ID) CODE=$(curl -sL -w "%{http_code}" $IP:10600/api -o /dev/null) || true if [ $CODE -eq 200 ]; then echo "Test passed - Tagging" sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:$HASH sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:"${BRANCH_NAME}-latest" if [ $HAS_TAG = true ]; then sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:$TAG if [ $BRANCH_NAME = "master" ]; then sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:latest fi fi else echo "Site returned " $CODE ERR=1 fi fi
#Pull down the system sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS stop sudo docker-compose $COMPOSE_ARGS rm --force -v
return $ERR

set +e COMPOSE_ARGS=" -f jenkins.yml -p jenkins " TAG=$(git describe --tags --exact-match) if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then HAS_TAG=true else HAS_TAG=false fi HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BRANCH_NAME=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/} set -e
if [ $DOCKER_PUSH = true ]; then echo "Pushing" if [[ ! -z ${DOCKER_USERNAME+x} ]] && [[ ! -z ${DOCKER_PASSWORD+x} ]]; then sudo docker login -e $DOCKER_EMAIL -u $DOCKER_USERNAME -p $DOCKER_PASSWORD $DOCKER_REGISTRY fi sudo docker push ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:$HASH sudo docker push ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:"${BRANCH_NAME}-latest" if [ $HAS_TAG = true ]; then sudo docker push ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:$TAG if [ $BRANCH_NAME = "master" ]; then sudo docker push ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/visualiser:latest fi fi else echo "Pushing of images disabled" fi
